m013ProvisioningTable.name: m013ProvisioningTable
m013ProvisioningTable.description: A table of provisioning configuration data used to configure an HDLC interface on a DS3 connection.

m013ProvisioningEntry.name: m013ProvisioningEntry
m013ProvisioningEntry.description: An entry in the table, containing information about provisioning an HDLC channel on a DS3 connection.

m013LogicalPortIndex.name: m013LogicalPortIndex
m013LogicalPortIndex.description: A per-slot unique HDLC channel number.

m013Description.name: m013Description
m013Description.description: A user description of this channel.

m013Ds3PortIndex.name: m013Ds3PortIndex
m013Ds3PortIndex.description: Physical DS3 port for channel being provisioned.

m013Ds1Fraction.name: m013Ds1Fraction
m013Ds1Fraction.description: The DS1 channel within the DS3 circuit that is used to create this HDLC channel. An entry of 0 indicates this is a clear channel (full DS3 bandwidth) connection.

m013Ds0Mask.name: m013Ds0Mask
m013Ds0Mask.description: This is a bit mask of the DS0 channels within the selected DS1 fraction that make up the desired HDLC channel. If m013Ds1Fraction is 0 this value has no meaning

m013IfIndex.name: m013IfIndex
m013IfIndex.description: A per-switch unique number for this HDLC channel. This number is a combination of Slot and Logical Port numbers.

m013Protocol.name: m013Protocol
m013Protocol.description: The L2 protocol that is used on this HDLC channel.

m013EntryStatus.name: m013EntryStatus
m013EntryStatus.description: Value used for the control of the creation of this interface.

m013ServiceTable.name: m013ServiceTable
m013ServiceTable.description: A table of M013 services status and parameter information.

m013ServiceEntry.name: m013ServiceEntry
m013ServiceEntry.description: An entry in the table, containing information about the M013 services.

m013ServiceSlotIndex.name: m013ServiceSlotIndex
m013ServiceSlotIndex.description: A unique value which identifies this HSM board slot.

m013ServiceLogicalPortIndex.name: m013ServiceLogicalPortIndex
m013ServiceLogicalPortIndex.description: A per-slot unique value which identifies this HDLC logical port.

m013ServiceNumber.name: m013ServiceNumber
m013ServiceNumber.description: The unique service number for this particular slot/logical port.

m013ServiceTableEntryType.name: m013ServiceTableEntryType
m013ServiceTableEntryType.description: The type of table entry for this M013 Serivce. A static entry is one that is stored in non-volatile memory. A dynamic entry is one that is automatically created for an unconfigured virtual circuit based on the the type of service (bridging or trunking) and whether a default VLAN is defined for the type of service. Changing the value via a write command from dynamic to static will cause the table entry to be stored into non-volatile memory. Setting a value of dynamic is not allowed.

m013ServiceDescription.name: m013ServiceDescription
m013ServiceDescription.description: A description for this M013 service.

m013ServiceVirtualCircuit.name: m013ServiceVirtualCircuit
m013ServiceVirtualCircuit.description: The virtual circuit for this service. In case of PPP it should be set to zero, in case of Frame Relay - to the appropriate DLCI value.

m013ServiceVlans.name: m013ServiceVlans
m013ServiceVlans.description: The Vlans for this service. Interpret this as a 16 bit field per vlan: Trunking 1-32, Bridging 1, IP 1

m013ServiceBridgingMode.name: m013ServiceBridgingMode
m013ServiceBridgingMode.description: The default Briding Mode, 0 = BRIDGE_ALL, 1 = ETHERNET ONLY

m013FrxPortTable.name: m013FrxPortTable
m013FrxPortTable.description: A table of port layer status and parameter information for the UNI's logical interface.

m013FrxPortEntry.name: m013FrxPortEntry
m013FrxPortEntry.description: An entry in the table, containing information about the logical layer of a UNI interface.

m013FrxPortSlotIndex.name: m013FrxPortSlotIndex
m013FrxPortSlotIndex.description: A unique value which identifies this HSM board slot.

m013FrxPortPortIndex.name: m013FrxPortPortIndex
m013FrxPortPortIndex.description: A per-slot unique value which identifies this HDLC logical port.

m013FrxPortDescription.name: m013FrxPortDescription
m013FrxPortDescription.description: A description for this Frame Relay port.

m013FrxPortAdminStatus.name: m013FrxPortAdminStatus
m013FrxPortAdminStatus.description: If set to enabled, enables Frame Relay Interface. If set to disabled, disables Frame Relay Interface

m013FrxPortDefaultIpRoutingAdminStatus.name: m013FrxPortDefaultIpRoutingAdminStatus
m013FrxPortDefaultIpRoutingAdminStatus.description: If set to enabled, enables Default IP Routing. If set to disabled, disables Default IP Routing

m013FrxPortDefaultBridgingAdminStatus.name: m013FrxPortDefaultBridgingAdminStatus
m013FrxPortDefaultBridgingAdminStatus.description: If set to enabled, enables Default Bridging. If set to disabled, disables Default Bridging.

m013FrxPortDefaultBridgingVLAN.name: m013FrxPortDefaultBridgingVLAN
m013FrxPortDefaultBridgingVLAN.description: The default VLAN for new PVCs that have not been configured for the Bridging Service. A value of zero(0) indicates that unconfigured VCs will not perform a bridging service and will discard all bridged format frames received or transmitted. A non-zero value indicates the bridging VLAN to be used if the network informs the port of a new VC.

m013FrxPortDefaultBridgingMode.name: m013FrxPortDefaultBridgingMode
m013FrxPortDefaultBridgingMode.description: The default Briding Mode, 0 = BRIDGE_ALL, 1 = ETHERNET ONLY

m013FrxPortDynamicVCCreation.name: m013FrxPortDynamicVCCreation
m013FrxPortDynamicVCCreation.description: If set to enabled, enables Dynamic VC creation. If set to disabled, disables Dynamic VC creation.

m013FrxVcControlTable.name: m013FrxVcControlTable
m013FrxVcControlTable.description: A table of Frame Relay virtual circuit configuration and control information.

m013FrxVcControlEntry.name: m013FrxVcControlEntry
m013FrxVcControlEntry.description: An entry in the table, containing information about the Frame Relay virtual circuit statistics.

m013FrxVcControlSlotIndex.name: m013FrxVcControlSlotIndex
m013FrxVcControlSlotIndex.description: A unique value which identifies this HSM board slot.

m013FrxVcControlPortIndex.name: m013FrxVcControlPortIndex
m013FrxVcControlPortIndex.description: A per-slot unique value which identifies this HDLC logical port.

m013FrxVcControlDlci.name: m013FrxVcControlDlci
m013FrxVcControlDlci.description: A unique value which identifies this Data Link Connection Identifier (DLCI) for this Frame Relay Virtual Circuit.

m013FrxVcControlIpRoutingAdminStatus.name: m013FrxVcControlIpRoutingAdminStatus
m013FrxVcControlIpRoutingAdminStatus.description: If set to enabled, enables IP Routing. If set to disabled, disables IP Routing

m013FrxVcStatsTable.name: m013FrxVcStatsTable
m013FrxVcStatsTable.description: A table of Frame Relay virtual circuit statistics information.

m013FrxVcStatsEntry.name: m013FrxVcStatsEntry
m013FrxVcStatsEntry.description: An entry in the table, containing information about the Frame Relay virtual circuit statistics.

m013FrxVcStatsSlotIndex.name: m013FrxVcStatsSlotIndex
m013FrxVcStatsSlotIndex.description: A unique value which identifies this HSM board slot.

m013FrxVcStatsPortIndex.name: m013FrxVcStatsPortIndex
m013FrxVcStatsPortIndex.description: A per-slot unique value which identifies this HDLC logical port.

m013FrxVcStatsDlci.name: m013FrxVcStatsDlci
m013FrxVcStatsDlci.description: A unique value which identifies this Data Link Connection Identifier (DLCI) for this Frame Relay Virtual Circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsTxIPOctets.name: m013FrxVcStatsTxIPOctets
m013FrxVcStatsTxIPOctets.description: The total number of transmitted octets (including the Frame Relay Header field) within routed IP format frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsTxIPFrames.name: m013FrxVcStatsTxIPFrames
m013FrxVcStatsTxIPFrames.description: The total number of transmitted routed IP format frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsRxIPOctets.name: m013FrxVcStatsRxIPOctets
m013FrxVcStatsRxIPOctets.description: The total number of received octets (including the Frame Relay Header field) within routed IP format frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsRxIPFrames.name: m013FrxVcStatsRxIPFrames
m013FrxVcStatsRxIPFrames.description: The total number of received routed IP format frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsTxIPXOctets.name: m013FrxVcStatsTxIPXOctets
m013FrxVcStatsTxIPXOctets.description: The total number of transmitted octets (including the Frame Relay Header field) within routed IPX format frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsTxIPXFrames.name: m013FrxVcStatsTxIPXFrames
m013FrxVcStatsTxIPXFrames.description: The total number of transmitted routed IPX format frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsRxIPXOctets.name: m013FrxVcStatsRxIPXOctets
m013FrxVcStatsRxIPXOctets.description: The total number of received octets (including the Frame Relay Header field) within routed IPX format frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsRxIPXFrames.name: m013FrxVcStatsRxIPXFrames
m013FrxVcStatsRxIPXFrames.description: The total number of received routed IPX format frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsTxBPDUOctets.name: m013FrxVcStatsTxBPDUOctets
m013FrxVcStatsTxBPDUOctets.description: The total number of transmitted octets (including the Frame Relay Header field) within BPDU frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsTxBPDUFrames.name: m013FrxVcStatsTxBPDUFrames
m013FrxVcStatsTxBPDUFrames.description: The total number of transmitted BPDU frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsRxBPDUOctets.name: m013FrxVcStatsRxBPDUOctets
m013FrxVcStatsRxBPDUOctets.description: The total number of received octets (including the Frame Relay Header field) within BPDU frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsRxBPDUFrames.name: m013FrxVcStatsRxBPDUFrames
m013FrxVcStatsRxBPDUFrames.description: The total number of received BPDU frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsTxEthernetOctets.name: m013FrxVcStatsTxEthernetOctets
m013FrxVcStatsTxEthernetOctets.description: The total number of transmitted octets (including the Frame Relay Header field) within bridged 802.3 format frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsTxEthernetFrames.name: m013FrxVcStatsTxEthernetFrames
m013FrxVcStatsTxEthernetFrames.description: The total number of transmitted bridged 802.3 format frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsRxEthernetOctets.name: m013FrxVcStatsRxEthernetOctets
m013FrxVcStatsRxEthernetOctets.description: The total number of received octets (including the Frame Relay Header field) within bridged 802.3 format frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsRxEthernetFrames.name: m013FrxVcStatsRxEthernetFrames
m013FrxVcStatsRxEthernetFrames.description: The total number of received bridged 802.3 format frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsTx8025Octets.name: m013FrxVcStatsTx8025Octets
m013FrxVcStatsTx8025Octets.description: The total number of transmitted octets (including the Frame Relay Header field) within 8025 frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsTx8025Frames.name: m013FrxVcStatsTx8025Frames
m013FrxVcStatsTx8025Frames.description: The total number of transmitted 8025 frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsRx8025Octets.name: m013FrxVcStatsRx8025Octets
m013FrxVcStatsRx8025Octets.description: The total number of received octets (including the Frame Relay Header field) within 8025 frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsRx8025Frames.name: m013FrxVcStatsRx8025Frames
m013FrxVcStatsRx8025Frames.description: The total number of received 8025 frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsTxFDDIOctets.name: m013FrxVcStatsTxFDDIOctets
m013FrxVcStatsTxFDDIOctets.description: The total number of transmitted octets (including the Frame Relay Header field) within FDDI frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsTxFDDIFrames.name: m013FrxVcStatsTxFDDIFrames
m013FrxVcStatsTxFDDIFrames.description: The total number of transmitted FDDI frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsRxFDDIOctets.name: m013FrxVcStatsRxFDDIOctets
m013FrxVcStatsRxFDDIOctets.description: The total number of received octets (including the Frame Relay Header field) within FDDI frames on this virtual circuit.

m013FrxVcStatsRxFDDIFrames.name: m013FrxVcStatsRxFDDIFrames
m013FrxVcStatsRxFDDIFrames.description: The total number of received FDDI frames on this virtual circuit.

m013PppxConfigTable.name: m013PppxConfigTable
m013PppxConfigTable.description: A table of PPP protocol entity configuration information.

m013PppxConfigEntry.name: m013PppxConfigEntry
m013PppxConfigEntry.description: An entry in the PPP Entity Configuration table, containing information about PPP protocol configuration.

m013PppxConfigSlotIndex.name: m013PppxConfigSlotIndex
m013PppxConfigSlotIndex.description: A unique value which identifies this HSM board slot.

m013PppxConfigPortIndex.name: m013PppxConfigPortIndex
m013PppxConfigPortIndex.description: A per-slot unique value which identifies this HDLC logical port.

m013PppxConfigDescription.name: m013PppxConfigDescription
m013PppxConfigDescription.description: A description for this PPP port.

m013PppxConfigAdminStatus.name: m013PppxConfigAdminStatus
m013PppxConfigAdminStatus.description: This object controls the Administrative Status of this PPP Entity. Enabled will allow the PPP Entity to operate. Disabled will disable the PPP Entity without deleting it. Delete will disable the PPP entity and delete the PPP configuration record.

m013PppxConfigMode.name: m013PppxConfigMode
m013PppxConfigMode.description: This object controls whether or not Multilink PPP will be used.

m013PppxConfigIpConfigAdminStatus.name: m013PppxConfigIpConfigAdminStatus
m013PppxConfigIpConfigAdminStatus.description: The immediate desired status of the IP network protocol. Setting this object to open will inject an administrative open event into the IP network protocol's finite state machine. Setting this object to close will inject an administrative close event into the IP network protocol's finite state machine.

m013PppxConfigBcpConfigAdminStatus.name: m013PppxConfigBcpConfigAdminStatus
m013PppxConfigBcpConfigAdminStatus.description: The immediate desired status of the BCP network protocol. Setting this object to open will inject an administrative open event into the BCP network protocol's finite state machine. Setting this object to close will inject an administrative close event into the IP network protocol's finite state machine.

m013PppxConfigIpxConfigAdminStatus.name: m013PppxConfigIpxConfigAdminStatus
m013PppxConfigIpxConfigAdminStatus.description: The immediate desired status of the IPX network protocol. Setting this object to open will inject an administrative open event into the IPX network protocol's finite state machine. Setting this object to close will inject an administrative close event into the IP network protocol's finite state machine.

m013PppxConfigRemoteIpAddress.name: m013PppxConfigRemoteIpAddress
m013PppxConfigRemoteIpAddress.description: The Remote IP address of the PPP connection. If set to 0.0.0.0 and IP routing is enabled then the IP address will be learned during the IP LCP negotiation. If set to a value then no IP address negotiation will occur.

m013PppxConfigAuthenticationType.name: m013PppxConfigAuthenticationType
m013PppxConfigAuthenticationType.description: The desired Authentication protocol to use for this PPP connection.

m013PppxConfigUserIdToRemote.name: m013PppxConfigUserIdToRemote
m013PppxConfigUserIdToRemote.description: User ID sent to remote during PAP or CHAP Authentication. If this string is empty, then no local to remote authentication will occur.

m013PppxConfigPasswordToRemote.name: m013PppxConfigPasswordToRemote
m013PppxConfigPasswordToRemote.description: Password sent to remote during PAP or CHAP Authentication. If this string is empty, then no local to remote authentication will occur.

m013PppxConfigUserIdFromRemote.name: m013PppxConfigUserIdFromRemote
m013PppxConfigUserIdFromRemote.description: User ID expected to be received remote during PAP or CHAP Authentication. If this string is empty, then no remote to local authentication will be required.

m013PppxConfigPasswordFromRemote.name: m013PppxConfigPasswordFromRemote
m013PppxConfigPasswordFromRemote.description: Password expected to be received remote during PAP or CHAP Authentication. If this string is empty, then no remote to local authentication will be required.

m013PppxConfigMaxFailureCount.name: m013PppxConfigMaxFailureCount
m013PppxConfigMaxFailureCount.description: PPP LCP and NCP Negotiation Maximum Failure Count

m013PppxConfigMaxConfigureCount.name: m013PppxConfigMaxConfigureCount
m013PppxConfigMaxConfigureCount.description: PPP LCP Negotiation Maximum Configure Count

m013PppxConfigMaxTerminateCount.name: m013PppxConfigMaxTerminateCount
m013PppxConfigMaxTerminateCount.description: PPP LCP Negotiation Maximum Terminate Count

m013PppxCpTable.name: m013PppxCpTable
m013PppxCpTable.description: A table of PPP connection Link Control and Network Control Protocol status and statistics information.

m013PppxCpEntry.name: m013PppxCpEntry
m013PppxCpEntry.description: An entry in the table, containing information about the PPP LCP and NCP status and statistics.

m013PppxCpSlotIndex.name: m013PppxCpSlotIndex
m013PppxCpSlotIndex.description: A unique value which identifies this WSM board slot that the PPP Control Protocol Entity is running on.

m013PppxCpPortIndex.name: m013PppxCpPortIndex
m013PppxCpPortIndex.description: A per-slot unique value which identifies this HDLC logical port.

m013PppxCpIpOperStatus.name: m013PppxCpIpOperStatus
m013PppxCpIpOperStatus.description: The operational status of the IP network protocol. If the value of this object is up then the finite state machine for the IP network protocol has reached the Opened state.

m013PppxCpIpxOperStatus.name: m013PppxCpIpxOperStatus
m013PppxCpIpxOperStatus.description: The operational status of the IPX network protocol. If the value of this object is up then the finite state machine for the IP network protocol has reached the Opened state.

m013PppxCpBcpOperStatus.name: m013PppxCpBcpOperStatus
m013PppxCpBcpOperStatus.description: The operational status of the BCP network protocol. If the value of this object is up then the finite state machine for the IP network protocol has reached the Opened state.

m013PppxCpTxLcpPackets.name: m013PppxCpTxLcpPackets
m013PppxCpTxLcpPackets.description: The total number of transmitted Link Control Protocol packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxCpRxLcpPackets.name: m013PppxCpRxLcpPackets
m013PppxCpRxLcpPackets.description: The total number of received Link Control Protocol packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxCpTxIpcpPackets.name: m013PppxCpTxIpcpPackets
m013PppxCpTxIpcpPackets.description: The total number of transmitted IP Control Protocol packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxCpRxIpcpPackets.name: m013PppxCpRxIpcpPackets
m013PppxCpRxIpcpPackets.description: The total number of received IP Control Protocol packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxCpTxIpxcpPackets.name: m013PppxCpTxIpxcpPackets
m013PppxCpTxIpxcpPackets.description: The total number of transmitted IPX Control Protocol packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxCpRxIpxcpPackets.name: m013PppxCpRxIpxcpPackets
m013PppxCpRxIpxcpPackets.description: The total number of received IPX Control Protocol packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxCpTxBcpPackets.name: m013PppxCpTxBcpPackets
m013PppxCpTxBcpPackets.description: The total number of transmitted Bridge Control Protocol packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxCpRxBcpPackets.name: m013PppxCpRxBcpPackets
m013PppxCpRxBcpPackets.description: The total number of received Bridge Control Protocol packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsTable.name: m013PppxStatsTable
m013PppxStatsTable.description: A table of PPP connection statistics information.

m013PppxStatsEntry.name: m013PppxStatsEntry
m013PppxStatsEntry.description: An entry in the table, containing information about the PPP PPP connection statistics.

m013PppxStatsSlotIndex.name: m013PppxStatsSlotIndex
m013PppxStatsSlotIndex.description: A unique value which identifies this HSM board slot that this PPP link is running on.

m013PppxStatsPortIndex.name: m013PppxStatsPortIndex
m013PppxStatsPortIndex.description: A per-slot unique value which identifies HDLC channel that this PPP link is running on.

m013PppxStatsTxIPOctets.name: m013PppxStatsTxIPOctets
m013PppxStatsTxIPOctets.description: The total number of transmitted octets (including the PPP Header field) within routed IP format packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsTxIPPackets.name: m013PppxStatsTxIPPackets
m013PppxStatsTxIPPackets.description: The total number of transmitted routed IP format packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsRxIPOctets.name: m013PppxStatsRxIPOctets
m013PppxStatsRxIPOctets.description: The total number of received octets (including the PPP Header field) within routed IP format packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsRxIPPackets.name: m013PppxStatsRxIPPackets
m013PppxStatsRxIPPackets.description: The total number of received routed IP format packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsTxIPXOctets.name: m013PppxStatsTxIPXOctets
m013PppxStatsTxIPXOctets.description: The total number of transmitted octets (including the PPP Header field) within routed IPX format packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsTxIPXPackets.name: m013PppxStatsTxIPXPackets
m013PppxStatsTxIPXPackets.description: The total number of transmitted routed IPX format packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsRxIPXOctets.name: m013PppxStatsRxIPXOctets
m013PppxStatsRxIPXOctets.description: The total number of received octets (including the PPP Header field) within routed IPX format packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsRxIPXPackets.name: m013PppxStatsRxIPXPackets
m013PppxStatsRxIPXPackets.description: The total number of received routed IPX format packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsTxBPDUOctets.name: m013PppxStatsTxBPDUOctets
m013PppxStatsTxBPDUOctets.description: The total number of transmitted octets (including the PPP Header field) within BPDU packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsTxBPDUPackets.name: m013PppxStatsTxBPDUPackets
m013PppxStatsTxBPDUPackets.description: The total number of transmitted BPDU packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsRxBPDUOctets.name: m013PppxStatsRxBPDUOctets
m013PppxStatsRxBPDUOctets.description: The total number of received octets (including the PPP Header field) within BPDU packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsRxBPDUPackets.name: m013PppxStatsRxBPDUPackets
m013PppxStatsRxBPDUPackets.description: The total number of received BPDU packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsTxEthernetOctets.name: m013PppxStatsTxEthernetOctets
m013PppxStatsTxEthernetOctets.description: The total number of transmitted octets (including the PPP Header field) within bridged 802.3 format packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsTxEthernetPackets.name: m013PppxStatsTxEthernetPackets
m013PppxStatsTxEthernetPackets.description: The total number of transmitted bridged 802.3 format packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsRxEthernetOctets.name: m013PppxStatsRxEthernetOctets
m013PppxStatsRxEthernetOctets.description: The total number of received octets (including the PPP Header field) within bridged 802.3 format packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsRxEthernetPackets.name: m013PppxStatsRxEthernetPackets
m013PppxStatsRxEthernetPackets.description: The total number of received bridged 802.3 format packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsTx8025Octets.name: m013PppxStatsTx8025Octets
m013PppxStatsTx8025Octets.description: The total number of transmitted octets (including the PPP Header field) within 8025 packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsTx8025Packets.name: m013PppxStatsTx8025Packets
m013PppxStatsTx8025Packets.description: The total number of transmitted 8025 packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsRx8025Octets.name: m013PppxStatsRx8025Octets
m013PppxStatsRx8025Octets.description: The total number of received octets (including the PPP Header field) within 8025 packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsRx8025Packets.name: m013PppxStatsRx8025Packets
m013PppxStatsRx8025Packets.description: The total number of received 8025 packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsTxFDDIOctets.name: m013PppxStatsTxFDDIOctets
m013PppxStatsTxFDDIOctets.description: The total number of transmitted octets (including the PPP Header field) within FDDI packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsTxFDDIPackets.name: m013PppxStatsTxFDDIPackets
m013PppxStatsTxFDDIPackets.description: The total number of transmitted FDDI packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsRxFDDIOctets.name: m013PppxStatsRxFDDIOctets
m013PppxStatsRxFDDIOctets.description: The total number of received octets (including the PPP Header field) within FDDI packets on this PPP connection.

m013PppxStatsRxFDDIPackets.name: m013PppxStatsRxFDDIPackets
m013PppxStatsRxFDDIPackets.description: The total number of received FDDI packets on this PPP connection.

m013IPRouterIfTable.name: m013IPRouterIfTable
m013IPRouterIfTable.description: A list of M013 Router instances in this physical OmniSwitch.

m013IPRouterIfLogicalPortIndex.name: m013IPRouterIfLogicalPortIndex
m013IPRouterIfLogicalPortIndex.description: A per-slot unique HDLC channel number.

m013IPRouterIfAddress.name: m013IPRouterIfAddress
m013IPRouterIfAddress.description: The IP address for this IP interface

m013IPRouterIfSubNetMask.name: m013IPRouterIfSubNetMask
m013IPRouterIfSubNetMask.description: The IP network subnet mask for this IP interface

m013IPRouterIfBcastAddress.name: m013IPRouterIfBcastAddress
m013IPRouterIfBcastAddress.description: The IP broadcast address for this IP interface

m013IPRouterIfDescription.name: m013IPRouterIfDescription
m013IPRouterIfDescription.description: Textual description of the router instance.

m013IPRouterIfAdmStatus.name: m013IPRouterIfAdmStatus
m013IPRouterIfAdmStatus.description: The particular routing environment can be enable(1) or disable(2) (or delete (3)) upon user's request.

m013IPRouterIfOperStatus.name: m013IPRouterIfOperStatus
m013IPRouterIfOperStatus.description: Provide operating status of a particular router envirnment.

m013IPRouterIfFramingType.name: m013IPRouterIfFramingType
m013IPRouterIfFramingType.description: Provides the ability to set the outbound frame type for IP traffic. The default frame type is Ethernet. If the frame type is incompatible with the transmitting media, appropriate translation will be performed at egress.

m013IPRouterIfMtu.name: m013IPRouterIfMtu
m013IPRouterIfMtu.description: Provides the ability to set the MTU size for this IP interface. The default size is 1500

m013IPRouterIfProtocol.name: m013IPRouterIfProtocol
m013IPRouterIfProtocol.description: The routing protocol(s) for this m013 router port. Which are: ipOther(1), ipRip(2), ipOspf(4), ipBgp(8), ipHello(16), ipIs-is(32)

m013Dsx3ConfigEntry.name: m013Dsx3ConfigEntry
m013Dsx3ConfigEntry.description: An entry in the DS3 Configuration table.

m013Dsx3LineIndex.name: m013Dsx3LineIndex
m013Dsx3LineIndex.description: This object is the identifier of a DS3 port on a managed device.

m013Dsx3ChannelizedMode.name: m013Dsx3ChannelizedMode
m013Dsx3ChannelizedMode.description: This object controls whether or not DS3 port is channelized. The default mode is enabled which means that this port is channelized to 28 T1s.

m013Dsx3MdlTransmitPath.name: m013Dsx3MdlTransmitPath
m013Dsx3MdlTransmitPath.description: Enables the MDL path message transmission.

m013Dsx3MdlTransmitIdleSignal.name: m013Dsx3MdlTransmitIdleSignal
m013Dsx3MdlTransmitIdleSignal.description: Enables the MDL idle signal message transmission.

m013Dsx3MdlTransmitTestSignal.name: m013Dsx3MdlTransmitTestSignal
m013Dsx3MdlTransmitTestSignal.description: Enables the MDL test signal message transmission.

m013Dsx3FEACEnable.name: m013Dsx3FEACEnable
m013Dsx3FEACEnable.description: Allows the DS3 to send the following alarms on the FEAC channel when detected locally: - DS3 Equipment Failure - LOS - OOF - AIS Received .

m013Dsx3REIEnable.name: m013Dsx3REIEnable
m013Dsx3REIEnable.description: Allows the DS3 to send Remote Error Indications.

m013Dsx3RxMdlEnable.name: m013Dsx3RxMdlEnable
m013Dsx3RxMdlEnable.description: Allows the DS3 to receive MDL messages.

m013Dsx3RxMdlPFI.name: m013Dsx3RxMdlPFI
m013Dsx3RxMdlPFI.description: Received MDL Path Facility Identification Code (PFI).

m013Dsx3RxMdlPortIdleSignalCode.name: m013Dsx3RxMdlPortIdleSignalCode
m013Dsx3RxMdlPortIdleSignalCode.description: Received MDL Port Idle Signal Code

m013Dsx3RemoteStatus.name: m013Dsx3RemoteStatus
m013Dsx3RemoteStatus.description: This variable indicates the Remote Line Status of the interface.

m013Dsx3RemoteStatusLastChange.name: m013Dsx3RemoteStatusLastChange
m013Dsx3RemoteStatusLastChange.description: The value of MIB II's sysUpTime object at the time the Remote DS3/E3 entered its current line status state. If the current state was entered prior to the last re-initialization of the proxy-agent, then this object contains a zero value.

m013Dsx3LedStatus.name: m013Dsx3LedStatus
m013Dsx3LedStatus.description: The LED state for this M013 Port. M013 module has 5 LEDs per port. The current bit definitions for the DS3 Port are: T3EN 0 - GRN OFF (0 off, 1 on) LOS 1 - RED OFF (0 off, 1 on) OOF 2 - RED OFF (0 off, 1 on) AIS 3 - RED OFF (0 off, 1 on) RAI 4 - YEL OFF (0 off, 1 on)

m013Dsx3Ds1StatsEnableMask.name: m013Dsx3Ds1StatsEnableMask
m013Dsx3Ds1StatsEnableMask.description: This is a 28 bit mask which allows selectively enable/disable stats collection on a particular DS1 within DS3 port. Each bit corresponds to one of the 28 DS1 within DS3 port.

m013Dsx3StatsEntry.name: m013Dsx3StatsEntry
m013Dsx3StatsEntry.description: An entry in the DS3 Statistics table.

m013Dsx3StatsLineIndex.name: m013Dsx3StatsLineIndex
m013Dsx3StatsLineIndex.description: This object is the identifier of a DS3 port on a managed device.

m013Dsx3StatsRxREI.name: m013Dsx3StatsRxREI
m013Dsx3StatsRxREI.description: The number of Remote Error Indications received.

m013Dsx3StatsRxFEAC.name: m013Dsx3StatsRxFEAC
m013Dsx3StatsRxFEAC.description: This object indicates the presence FEAC being received by this port. This object only applies to DS3 interface with framing format configured to C-bit parity. A value of dsx3NoFEAC(1) is returned for other cases.

m013Dsx1ConfigEntry.name: m013Dsx1ConfigEntry
m013Dsx1ConfigEntry.description: An entry in the DS3 Configuration table.

m013Dsx1LineIndex.name: m013Dsx1LineIndex
m013Dsx1LineIndex.description: This object is the identifier of a DS1 port on a managed device.

m013Dsx1T1BertPattern.name: m013Dsx1T1BertPattern
m013Dsx1T1BertPattern.description: This variable represents T1 BERT Pattern configuration. The values mean: 1 - 2^15-1, pseudo-random O.151 test pattern (32767-bit long) 2 - 2^20-1, pseudo-random O.151 test pattern (1048575-bit long) 3 - 2^20-QRSS, pseudo-random QRSS O.151 test pattern (1048575-bit long) 4 - 2^23-1, pseudo-random O.151 test pattern (8388607-bit long) 5 - 0s, respective test pattern of all zeros 6 - 1s, respective test pattern of all ones

m013Dsx1RemoteStatus.name: m013Dsx1RemoteStatus
m013Dsx1RemoteStatus.description: This variable indicates the Remote Line Status of the interface.

m013Dsx1RemoteStatusLastChange.name: m013Dsx1RemoteStatusLastChange
m013Dsx1RemoteStatusLastChange.description: The value of MIB II's sysUpTime object at the time the Remote DS1 entered its current line status state. If the current state was entered prior to the last re-initialization of the proxy-agent, then this object contains a zero value.
